00058 static int ll_blksize_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00059 {
00060         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00061         struct obd_statfs osfs;
00062         int rc;
00063 
00064         LASSERT(sb != NULL);
00065         rc = ll_statfs_internal(sb, &osfs,
00066                                 cfs_time_shift_64(-OBD_STATFS_CACHE_SECONDS),
00067                                 OBD_STATFS_NODELAY);
00068         if (!rc)
00069                 seq_printf(m, "%u\n", osfs.os_bsize);
00070         return rc;
00071 }
00072 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(ll_blksize);

00074 static int ll_kbytestotal_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00075 {
00076         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00077         struct obd_statfs osfs;
00078         int rc;
00079 
00080         LASSERT(sb != NULL);
00081         rc = ll_statfs_internal(sb, &osfs,
00082                                 cfs_time_shift_64(-OBD_STATFS_CACHE_SECONDS),
00083                                 OBD_STATFS_NODELAY);
00084         if (!rc) {
00085                 __u32 blk_size = osfs.os_bsize >> 10;
00086                 __u64 result = osfs.os_blocks;
00087 
00088                 while (blk_size >>= 1)
00089                         result <<= 1;
00090 
00091                 seq_printf(m, LPU64"\n", result);
00092         }
00093         return rc;
00094 }
00095 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(ll_kbytestotal);

00217 static ssize_t ll_xattr_cache_seq_write(struct file *file,
00218                                         const char __user *buffer,
00219                                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00220 {
00221         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00222         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi((struct super_block *)m->private);
00223         __s64 val;
00224         int rc;
00225 
00226         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00227         if (rc)
00228                 return rc;
00229 
00230         if (val != 0 && val != 1)
00231                 return -ERANGE;
00232 
00233         if (val == 1 && !(sbi->ll_flags & LL_SBI_XATTR_CACHE))
00234                 return -ENOTSUPP;
00235 
00236         sbi->ll_xattr_cache_enabled = val;
00237 
00238         return count;
00239 }
00240 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_xattr_cache);

00254 static int ll_max_readahead_mb_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00255 {
00256         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00257         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00258         long pages_number;
00259         int mult;
00260 
00261         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00262         pages_number = sbi->ll_ra_info.ra_max_pages;
00263         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00264 
00265         mult = 1 << (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT);
00266         return lprocfs_seq_read_frac_helper(m, pages_number, mult);
00267 }
00268 
00269 static ssize_t
00270 ll_max_readahead_mb_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00271                               size_t count, loff_t *off)
00272 {
00273         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00274         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00275         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00276         __s64 pages_number;
00277         int rc;
00278 
00279         rc = lprocfs_str_with_units_to_s64(buffer, count, &pages_number, 'M');
00280         if (rc)
00281                 return rc;
00282 
00283         pages_number >>= PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00284 
00285         if (pages_number < 0 || pages_number > totalram_pages / 2) {
00286                 /* 1/2 of RAM */
00287                 CERROR("%s: can't set max_readahead_mb=%lu > %luMB\n",
00288                        ll_get_fsname(sb, NULL, 0),
00289                        (unsigned long)pages_number >> (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT),
00290                        totalram_pages >> (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT + 1));
00291                 return -ERANGE;
00292         }
00293 
00294         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00295         sbi->ll_ra_info.ra_max_pages = pages_number;
00296         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00297         return count;
00298 }
00299 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_max_readahead_mb);
00300 
00301 static int ll_max_readahead_per_file_mb_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)

00309         pages_number = sbi->ll_ra_info.ra_max_pages_per_file;

00313         return lprocfs_seq_read_frac_helper(m, pages_number, mult);

00316 static ssize_t
00317 ll_max_readahead_per_file_mb_seq_write(struct file *file,
00318                                        const char __user *buffer,
00319                                        size_t count, loff_t *off)
00320 {
00321         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00322         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00323         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00324         int rc;
00325         __s64 pages_number;
00326 
00327         rc = lprocfs_str_with_units_to_s64(buffer, count, &pages_number, 'M');
00328         if (rc)
00329                 return rc;
00330 
00331         pages_number >>= PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00332 
00333         if (pages_number < 0 || pages_number > sbi->ll_ra_info.ra_max_pages) {
00334                 CERROR("%s: can't set max_readahead_per_file_mb=%lu > "
00335                        "max_read_ahead_mb=%lu\n", ll_get_fsname(sb, NULL, 0),
00336                        (unsigned long)pages_number >> (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT),
00337                        sbi->ll_ra_info.ra_max_pages >> (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT));
00338                 return -ERANGE;
00339         }
00340 
00341         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00342         sbi->ll_ra_info.ra_max_pages_per_file = pages_number;
00343         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00344         return count;
00345 }
00346 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_max_readahead_per_file_mb);

00348 static int ll_max_read_ahead_whole_mb_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00349 {
00350         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00351         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00352         long pages_number;
00353         int mult;
00354

00356         pages_number = sbi->ll_ra_info.ra_max_read_ahead_whole_pages;
00357         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_lock);

00360         return lprocfs_seq_read_frac_helper(m, pages_number, mult);

00362 
00363 static ssize_t
00364 ll_max_read_ahead_whole_mb_seq_write(struct file *file,
00365                                      const char __user *buffer,
00366                                      size_t count, loff_t *off)
00367 {
00368         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00369         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00370         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00371         int rc;
00372         __s64 pages_number;
00373 
00374         rc = lprocfs_str_with_units_to_s64(buffer, count, &pages_number, 'M');
00375         if (rc)
00376                 return rc;
00377 
00378         pages_number >>= PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00379 
00380         /* Cap this at the current max readahead window size, the readahead
00381          * algorithm does this anyway so it's pointless to set it larger. */
00382         if (pages_number < 0 ||
00383             pages_number > sbi->ll_ra_info.ra_max_pages_per_file) {
00384                 int pages_shift = 20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00385                 CERROR("%s: can't set max_read_ahead_whole_mb=%lu > "
00386                        "max_read_ahead_per_file_mb=%lu\n",
00387                        ll_get_fsname(sb, NULL, 0),
00388                        (unsigned long)pages_number >> pages_shift,
00389                        sbi->ll_ra_info.ra_max_pages_per_file >> pages_shift);
00390                 return -ERANGE;
00391         }
00392 
00393         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00394         sbi->ll_ra_info.ra_max_read_ahead_whole_pages = pages_number;
00395         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00396         return count;
00397 }
00398 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_max_read_ahead_whole_mb);
00399 
00400 static int ll_max_cached_mb_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00401 {
00402         struct super_block     *sb    = m->private;
00403         struct ll_sb_info      *sbi   = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00404         struct cl_client_cache *cache = sbi->ll_cache;
00405         int shift = 20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00406         long max_cached_mb;
00407         long unused_mb;
00408 
00409         max_cached_mb = cache->ccc_lru_max >> shift;
00410         unused_mb = atomic_long_read(&cache->ccc_lru_left) >> shift;
00411         seq_printf(m, "users: %d\n"
00412                    "max_cached_mb: %ld\n"
00413                    "used_mb: %ld\n"
00414                    "unused_mb: %ld\n"
00415                    "reclaim_count: %u\n",
00416                    atomic_read(&cache->ccc_users),
00417                    max_cached_mb,
00418                    max_cached_mb - unused_mb,
00419                    unused_mb,
00420                    cache->ccc_lru_shrinkers);
00421         return 0;
00422 }
00423 
00424 static ssize_t
00425 ll_max_cached_mb_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00426                            size_t count, loff_t *off)
00427 {
00428         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00429         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00430         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00431         struct cl_client_cache *cache = sbi->ll_cache;
00432         struct lu_env *env;
00433         long diff = 0;
00434         long nrpages = 0;
00435         __u16 refcheck;
00436         __s64 pages_number;
00437         long rc;
00438         char kernbuf[128];
00439         ENTRY;
00440 
00441         if (count >= sizeof(kernbuf))
00442                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00443 
00444         if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buffer, count))
00445                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
00446         kernbuf[count] = 0;
00447 
00448         buffer += lprocfs_find_named_value(kernbuf, "max_cached_mb:", &count) -
00449                   kernbuf;
00450         rc = lprocfs_str_with_units_to_s64(buffer, count, &pages_number, 'M');
00451         if (rc)
00452                 RETURN(rc);
00453 
00454         pages_number >>= PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00455 
00456         if (pages_number < 0 || pages_number > totalram_pages) {
00457                 CERROR("%s: can't set max cache more than %lu MB\n",
00458                        ll_get_fsname(sb, NULL, 0),
00459                        totalram_pages >> (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT));
00460                 RETURN(-ERANGE);
00461         }
00462         /* Allow enough cache so clients can make well-formed RPCs */
00463         pages_number = max_t(long, pages_number, PTLRPC_MAX_BRW_PAGES);
00464 
00465         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00466         diff = pages_number - cache->ccc_lru_max;
00467         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00468 
00469         /* easy - add more LRU slots. */
00470         if (diff >= 0) {
00471                 atomic_long_add(diff, &cache->ccc_lru_left);
00472                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00473         }
00474 
00475         env = cl_env_get(&refcheck);
00476         if (IS_ERR(env))
00477                 RETURN(rc);
00478 
00479         diff = -diff;
00480         while (diff > 0) {
00481                 long tmp;
00482 
00483                 /* reduce LRU budget from free slots. */
00484                 do {
00485                         long ov, nv;
00486 
00487                         ov = atomic_long_read(&cache->ccc_lru_left);
00488                         if (ov == 0)
00489                                 break;
00490 
00491                         nv = ov > diff ? ov - diff : 0;
00492                         rc = atomic_long_cmpxchg(&cache->ccc_lru_left, ov, nv);
00493                         if (likely(ov == rc)) {
00494                                 diff -= ov - nv;
00495                                 nrpages += ov - nv;
00496                                 break;
00497                         }
00498                 } while (1);
00499 
00500                 if (diff <= 0)
00501                         break;
00502 
00503                 if (sbi->ll_dt_exp == NULL) { /* being initialized */
00504                         rc = -ENODEV;
00505                         break;
00506                 }
00507 
00508                 /* difficult - have to ask OSCs to drop LRU slots. */
00509                 tmp = diff << 1;
00510                 rc = obd_set_info_async(env, sbi->ll_dt_exp,
00511                                 sizeof(KEY_CACHE_LRU_SHRINK),
00512                                 KEY_CACHE_LRU_SHRINK,
00513                                 sizeof(tmp), &tmp, NULL);
00514                 if (rc < 0)
00515                         break;
00516         }
00517         cl_env_put(env, &refcheck);
00518 
00519 out:
00520         if (rc >= 0) {
00521                 spin_lock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00522                 cache->ccc_lru_max = pages_number;
00523                 spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_lock);
00524                 rc = count;
00525         } else {
00526                 atomic_long_add(nrpages, &cache->ccc_lru_left);
00527         }
00528         return rc;
00529 }
00530 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_max_cached_mb);
00531 
00532 static int ll_checksum_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00533 {
00534         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00535         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00536 
00537         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", (sbi->ll_flags & LL_SBI_CHECKSUM) ? 1 : 0);
00538         return 0;
00539 }
00540 
00541 static ssize_t ll_checksum_seq_write(struct file *file,
00542                                      const char __user *buffer,
00543                                      size_t count, loff_t *off)
00544 {
00545         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00546         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi((struct super_block *)m->private);
00547         int rc;
00548         __s64 val;
00549 
00550         if (!sbi->ll_dt_exp)
00551                 /* Not set up yet */
00552                 return -EAGAIN;
00553 
00554         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00555         if (rc)
00556                 return rc;
00557         if (val)
00558                 sbi->ll_flags |= LL_SBI_CHECKSUM;
00559         else
00560                 sbi->ll_flags &= ~LL_SBI_CHECKSUM;
00561 
00562         rc = obd_set_info_async(NULL, sbi->ll_dt_exp, sizeof(KEY_CHECKSUM),
00563                                 KEY_CHECKSUM, sizeof(val), &val, NULL);
00564         if (rc)
00565                 CWARN("Failed to set OSC checksum flags: %d\n", rc);
00566 
00567         return count;
00568 }
00569 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_checksum);
00570 
00571 static int ll_rd_track_id(struct seq_file *m, enum stats_track_type type)
00572 {
00573         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00574 
00575         if (ll_s2sbi(sb)->ll_stats_track_type == type) {
00576                 seq_printf(m, "%d\n",
00577                            ll_s2sbi(sb)->ll_stats_track_id);
00578         } else if (ll_s2sbi(sb)->ll_stats_track_type == STATS_TRACK_ALL) {
00579                 seq_puts(m, "0 (all)\n");
00580         } else {
00581                 seq_puts(m, "untracked\n");
00582         }
00583         return 0;
00584 }
00585 
00586 static int ll_wr_track_id(const char __user *buffer, unsigned long count,
00587                           void *data, enum stats_track_type type)
00588 {
00589         struct super_block *sb = data;
00590         int rc;
00591         __s64 pid;
00592 
00593         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &pid);
00594         if (rc)
00595                 return rc;
00596         if (pid > INT_MAX || pid < 0)
00597                 return -ERANGE;
00598 
00599         ll_s2sbi(sb)->ll_stats_track_id = pid;
00600         if (pid == 0)
00601                 ll_s2sbi(sb)->ll_stats_track_type = STATS_TRACK_ALL;
00602         else
00603                 ll_s2sbi(sb)->ll_stats_track_type = type;
00604         lprocfs_clear_stats(ll_s2sbi(sb)->ll_stats);
00605         return count;
00606 }
00607 
00608 static int ll_track_pid_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00609 {
00610         return ll_rd_track_id(m, STATS_TRACK_PID);
00611 }

00658 
00659 static ssize_t ll_statahead_max_seq_write(struct file *file,
00660                                           const char __user *buffer,
00661                                           size_t count, loff_t *off)
00662 {
00663         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00664         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi((struct super_block *)m->private);
00665         int rc;
00666         __s64 val;
00667 
00668         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00669         if (rc)
00670                 return rc;
00671 
00672         if (val >= 0 && val <= LL_SA_RPC_MAX)
00673                 sbi->ll_sa_max = val;
00674         else
00675                 CERROR("Bad statahead_max value "LPD64". Valid values are in "
00676                        "the range [0, %d]\n", val, LL_SA_RPC_MAX);
00677 
00678         return count;
00679 }
00680 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_statahead_max);

00788 static int ll_default_easize_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)

00797                 return rc;

00802 
00819 static ssize_t ll_default_easize_seq_write(struct file *file,
00820                                            const char __user *buffer,
00821                                            size_t count, loff_t *unused)
00822 {
00823         struct seq_file *seq = file->private_data;
00824         struct super_block *sb = (struct super_block *)seq->private;
00825         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00826         __s64 val;
00827         int rc;
00828 
00829         if (count == 0)
00830                 return 0;
00831 
00832         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00833         if (rc)
00834                 return rc;
00835         if (val < 0 || val > INT_MAX)
00836                 return -ERANGE;
00837 
00838         rc = ll_set_default_mdsize(sbi, val);
00839         if (rc)
00840                 return rc;
00841 
00842         return count;
00843 }
00844 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_default_easize);
00845 
00846 static int ll_sbi_flags_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00847 {
00848         const char *str[] = LL_SBI_FLAGS;
00849         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00850         int flags = ll_s2sbi(sb)->ll_flags;
00851         int i = 0;
00852 
00853         while (flags != 0) {
00854                 if (ARRAY_SIZE(str) <= i) {
00855                         CERROR("%s: Revise array LL_SBI_FLAGS to match sbi "
00856                                 "flags please.\n", ll_get_fsname(sb, NULL, 0));
00857                         return -EINVAL;
00858                 }
00859 
00860                 if (flags & 0x1)
00861                         seq_printf(m, "%s ", str[i]);
00862                 flags >>= 1;
00863                 ++i;
00864         }
00865         seq_printf(m, "\b\n");
00866         return 0;
00867 }
00868 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(ll_sbi_flags);
00869 
00870 static int ll_unstable_stats_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00871 {
00872         struct super_block      *sb    = m->private;
00873         struct ll_sb_info       *sbi   = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00874         struct cl_client_cache  *cache = sbi->ll_cache;
00875         long pages;
00876         int mb;
00877 
00878         pages = atomic_long_read(&cache->ccc_unstable_nr);
00879         mb    = (pages * PAGE_CACHE_SIZE) >> 20;
00880 
00881         seq_printf(m, "unstable_check:     %8d\n"
00882                    "unstable_pages: %12ld\n"
00883                    "unstable_mb:        %8d\n",
00884                    cache->ccc_unstable_check, pages, mb);
00885         return 0;
00886 }
00887 
00888 static ssize_t ll_unstable_stats_seq_write(struct file *file,
00889                                            const char __user *buffer,
00890                                            size_t count, loff_t *unused)
00891 {
00892         struct seq_file *seq = file->private_data;
00893         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi((struct super_block *)seq->private);
00894         char kernbuf[128];
00895         int rc;
00896         __s64 val;
00897 
00898         if (count == 0)
00899                 return 0;
00900         if (count >= sizeof(kernbuf))
00901                 return -EINVAL;
00902 
00903         if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buffer, count))
00904                 return -EFAULT;
00905         kernbuf[count] = 0;
00906 
00907         buffer += lprocfs_find_named_value(kernbuf, "unstable_check:", &count) -
00908                   kernbuf;
00909         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00910         if (rc < 0)
00911                 return rc;
00912 
00913         /* borrow lru lock to set the value */
00914         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_cache->ccc_lru_lock);
00915         sbi->ll_cache->ccc_unstable_check = !!val;
00916         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_cache->ccc_lru_lock);
00917 
00918         return count;
00919 }
00920 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_unstable_stats);
00921 
00922 static int ll_root_squash_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)

00945 
00946 static int ll_nosquash_nids_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00947 {
00948         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00949         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00950         struct root_squash_info *squash = &sbi->ll_squash;
00951         int len;
00952 
00953         down_read(&squash->rsi_sem);
00954         if (!list_empty(&squash->rsi_nosquash_nids)) {
00955                 len = cfs_print_nidlist(m->buf + m->count, m->size - m->count,
00956                                         &squash->rsi_nosquash_nids);
00957                 m->count += len;
00958                 seq_putc(m, '\n');
00959         } else {
00960                 seq_puts(m, "NONE\n");
00961         }
00962         up_read(&squash->rsi_sem);
00963 
00964         return 0;
00965 }
00966 
00967 static ssize_t ll_nosquash_nids_seq_write(struct file *file,
00968                                           const char __user *buffer,
00969                                           size_t count, loff_t *off)
00970 {
00971         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00972         struct super_block *sb = m->private;
00973         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
00974         struct root_squash_info *squash = &sbi->ll_squash;
00975         int rc;
00976 
00977         rc = lprocfs_wr_nosquash_nids(buffer, count, squash,
00978                                       ll_get_fsname(sb, NULL, 0));
00979         if (rc < 0)
00980                 return rc;
00981 
00982         ll_compute_rootsquash_state(sbi);
00983 
00984         return rc;
00985 }
00986 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_nosquash_nids);

01099 
01100 void ll_stats_ops_tally(struct ll_sb_info *sbi, int op, int count)
01101 {
01102         if (!sbi->ll_stats)
01103                 return;
01104         if (sbi->ll_stats_track_type == STATS_TRACK_ALL)
01105                 lprocfs_counter_add(sbi->ll_stats, op, count);
01106         else if (sbi->ll_stats_track_type == STATS_TRACK_PID &&
01107                  sbi->ll_stats_track_id == current->pid)
01108                 lprocfs_counter_add(sbi->ll_stats, op, count);
01109         else if (sbi->ll_stats_track_type == STATS_TRACK_PPID &&
01110                  sbi->ll_stats_track_id == current->parent->pid)
01111                 lprocfs_counter_add(sbi->ll_stats, op, count);
01112         else if (sbi->ll_stats_track_type == STATS_TRACK_GID &&
01113                  sbi->ll_stats_track_id ==
01114                         from_kgid(&init_user_ns, current_gid()))
01115                 lprocfs_counter_add(sbi->ll_stats, op, count);
01116 }
01117 EXPORT_SYMBOL(ll_stats_ops_tally);
01118 
01119 static const char *ra_stat_string[] = {
01120         [RA_STAT_HIT] = "hits",
01121         [RA_STAT_MISS] = "misses",
01122         [RA_STAT_DISTANT_READPAGE] = "readpage not consecutive",
01123         [RA_STAT_MISS_IN_WINDOW] = "miss inside window",
01124         [RA_STAT_FAILED_GRAB_PAGE] = "failed grab_cache_page",
01125         [RA_STAT_FAILED_MATCH] = "failed lock match",
01126         [RA_STAT_DISCARDED] = "read but discarded",
01127         [RA_STAT_ZERO_LEN] = "zero length file",
01128         [RA_STAT_ZERO_WINDOW] = "zero size window",
01129         [RA_STAT_EOF] = "read-ahead to EOF",
01130         [RA_STAT_MAX_IN_FLIGHT] = "hit max r-a issue",
01131         [RA_STAT_WRONG_GRAB_PAGE] = "wrong page from grab_cache_page",
01132         [RA_STAT_FAILED_REACH_END] = "failed to reach end"
01133 };
01134 
01135 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(llite, name);
01136 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(llite, uuid);
01137 
01138 int lprocfs_register_mountpoint(struct proc_dir_entry *parent,
01139                                 struct super_block *sb, char *osc, char *mdc)
01140 {
01141         struct lprocfs_vars lvars[2];
01142         struct lustre_sb_info *lsi = s2lsi(sb);
01143         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = ll_s2sbi(sb);
01144         struct obd_device *obd;
01145         struct proc_dir_entry *dir;
01146         char name[MAX_STRING_SIZE + 1], *ptr;
01147         int err, id, len, rc;
01148         ENTRY;
01149 
01150         memset(lvars, 0, sizeof(lvars));
01151 
01152         name[MAX_STRING_SIZE] = '\0';
01153         lvars[0].name = name;
01154 
01155         LASSERT(sbi != NULL);
01156         LASSERT(mdc != NULL);
01157         LASSERT(osc != NULL);
01158 
01159         /* Get fsname */
01160         len = strlen(lsi->lsi_lmd->lmd_profile);
01161         ptr = strrchr(lsi->lsi_lmd->lmd_profile, '-');
01162         if (ptr && (strcmp(ptr, "-client") == 0))
01163                 len -= 7;
01164 
01165         /* Mount info */
01166         snprintf(name, MAX_STRING_SIZE, "%.*s-%p", len,
01167                  lsi->lsi_lmd->lmd_profile, sb);
01168 
01169         sbi->ll_proc_root = lprocfs_register(name, parent, NULL, NULL);
01170         if (IS_ERR(sbi->ll_proc_root)) {
01171                 err = PTR_ERR(sbi->ll_proc_root);
01172                 sbi->ll_proc_root = NULL;
01173                 RETURN(err);
01174         }
01175 
01176         rc = lprocfs_seq_create(sbi->ll_proc_root, "dump_page_cache", 0444,
01177                                 &vvp_dump_pgcache_file_ops, sbi);
01178         if (rc)
01179                 CWARN("Error adding the dump_page_cache file\n");
01180 
01181         rc = lprocfs_seq_create(sbi->ll_proc_root, "extents_stats", 0644,
01182                                 &ll_rw_extents_stats_fops, sbi);
01183         if (rc)
01184                 CWARN("Error adding the extent_stats file\n");
01185 
01186         rc = lprocfs_seq_create(sbi->ll_proc_root, "extents_stats_per_process",
01187                                 0644, &ll_rw_extents_stats_pp_fops, sbi);
01188         if (rc)
01189                 CWARN("Error adding the extents_stats_per_process file\n");
01190 
01191         rc = lprocfs_seq_create(sbi->ll_proc_root, "offset_stats", 0644,
01192                                 &ll_rw_offset_stats_fops, sbi);
01193         if (rc)
01194                 CWARN("Error adding the offset_stats file\n");
01195 
01196         /* File operations stats */
01197         sbi->ll_stats = lprocfs_alloc_stats(LPROC_LL_FILE_OPCODES,
01198                                             LPROCFS_STATS_FLAG_NONE);
01199         if (sbi->ll_stats == NULL)
01200                 GOTO(out, err = -ENOMEM);
01201         /* do counter init */
01202         for (id = 0; id < LPROC_LL_FILE_OPCODES; id++) {
01203                 __u32 type = llite_opcode_table[id].type;
01204                 void *ptr = NULL;
01205                 if (type & LPROCFS_TYPE_REGS)
01206                         ptr = "regs";
01207                 else if (type & LPROCFS_TYPE_BYTES)
01208                         ptr = "bytes";
01209                 else if (type & LPROCFS_TYPE_PAGES)
01210                         ptr = "pages";
01211                 lprocfs_counter_init(sbi->ll_stats,
01212                                      llite_opcode_table[id].opcode,
01213                                      (type & LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX),
01214                                      llite_opcode_table[id].opname, ptr);
01215         }
01216         err = lprocfs_register_stats(sbi->ll_proc_root, "stats", sbi->ll_stats);
01217         if (err)
01218                 GOTO(out, err);
01219 
01220         sbi->ll_ra_stats = lprocfs_alloc_stats(ARRAY_SIZE(ra_stat_string),
01221                                                LPROCFS_STATS_FLAG_NONE);
01222         if (sbi->ll_ra_stats == NULL)
01223                 GOTO(out, err = -ENOMEM);
01224 
01225         for (id = 0; id < ARRAY_SIZE(ra_stat_string); id++)
01226                 lprocfs_counter_init(sbi->ll_ra_stats, id, 0,
01227                                      ra_stat_string[id], "pages");
01228         err = lprocfs_register_stats(sbi->ll_proc_root, "read_ahead_stats",
01229                                      sbi->ll_ra_stats);
01230         if (err)
01231                 GOTO(out, err);
01232 
01233 
01234         err = lprocfs_add_vars(sbi->ll_proc_root, lprocfs_llite_obd_vars, sb);
01235         if (err)
01236                 GOTO(out, err);
01237 
01238         /* MDC info */
01239         obd = class_name2obd(mdc);
01240 
01241         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
01242         LASSERT(obd->obd_magic == OBD_DEVICE_MAGIC);
01243         LASSERT(obd->obd_type->typ_name != NULL);
01244 
01245         dir = proc_mkdir(obd->obd_type->typ_name, sbi->ll_proc_root);
01246         if (dir == NULL)
01247                 GOTO(out, err = -ENOMEM);
01248 
01249         snprintf(name, MAX_STRING_SIZE, "common_name");
01250         lvars[0].fops = &llite_name_fops;
01251         err = lprocfs_add_vars(dir, lvars, obd);
01252         if (err)
01253                 GOTO(out, err);
01254 
01255         snprintf(name, MAX_STRING_SIZE, "uuid");
01256         lvars[0].fops = &llite_uuid_fops;
01257         err = lprocfs_add_vars(dir, lvars, obd);
01258         if (err)
01259                 GOTO(out, err);
01260 
01261         /* OSC */
01262         obd = class_name2obd(osc);
01263 
01264         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
01265         LASSERT(obd->obd_magic == OBD_DEVICE_MAGIC);
01266         LASSERT(obd->obd_type->typ_name != NULL);
01267 
01268         dir = proc_mkdir(obd->obd_type->typ_name, sbi->ll_proc_root);
01269         if (dir == NULL)
01270                 GOTO(out, err = -ENOMEM);
01271 
01272         snprintf(name, MAX_STRING_SIZE, "common_name");
01273         lvars[0].fops = &llite_name_fops;
01274         err = lprocfs_add_vars(dir, lvars, obd);
01275         if (err)
01276                 GOTO(out, err);
01277 
01278         snprintf(name, MAX_STRING_SIZE, "uuid");
01279         lvars[0].fops = &llite_uuid_fops;
01280         err = lprocfs_add_vars(dir, lvars, obd);
01281 out:
01282         if (err) {
01283                 lprocfs_remove(&sbi->ll_proc_root);
01284                 lprocfs_free_stats(&sbi->ll_ra_stats);
01285                 lprocfs_free_stats(&sbi->ll_stats);
01286         }
01287         RETURN(err);
01288 }
01289 
01290 void lprocfs_unregister_mountpoint(struct ll_sb_info *sbi)
01291 {
01292         if (sbi->ll_proc_root) {
01293                 lprocfs_remove(&sbi->ll_proc_root);
01294                 lprocfs_free_stats(&sbi->ll_ra_stats);
01295                 lprocfs_free_stats(&sbi->ll_stats);
01296         }
01297 }
01298 #undef MAX_STRING_SIZE
01299 
01300 #define pct(a,b) (b ? a * 100 / b : 0)
01301 
01302 static void ll_display_extents_info(struct ll_rw_extents_info *io_extents,
01303                                    struct seq_file *seq, int which)
01304 {
01305         unsigned long read_tot = 0, write_tot = 0, read_cum, write_cum;
01306         unsigned long start, end, r, w;
01307         char *unitp = "KMGTPEZY";
01308         int i, units = 10;
01309         struct per_process_info *pp_info = &io_extents->pp_extents[which];
01310 
01311         read_cum = 0;
01312         write_cum = 0;
01313         start = 0;
01314 
01315         for(i = 0; i < LL_HIST_MAX; i++) {
01316                 read_tot += pp_info->pp_r_hist.oh_buckets[i];
01317                 write_tot += pp_info->pp_w_hist.oh_buckets[i];
01318         }
01319 
01320         for(i = 0; i < LL_HIST_MAX; i++) {
01321                 r = pp_info->pp_r_hist.oh_buckets[i];
01322                 w = pp_info->pp_w_hist.oh_buckets[i];
01323                 read_cum += r;
01324                 write_cum += w;
01325                 end = 1 << (i + LL_HIST_START - units);
01326                 seq_printf(seq, "%4lu%c - %4lu%c%c: %14lu %4lu %4lu  | "
01327                            "%14lu %4lu %4lu\n", start, *unitp, end, *unitp,
01328                            (i == LL_HIST_MAX - 1) ? '+' : ' ',
01329                            r, pct(r, read_tot), pct(read_cum, read_tot),
01330                            w, pct(w, write_tot), pct(write_cum, write_tot));
01331                 start = end;
01332                 if (start == 1<<10) {
01333                         start = 1;
01334                         units += 10;
01335                         unitp++;
01336                 }
01337                 if (read_cum == read_tot && write_cum == write_tot)
01338                         break;
01339         }
01340 }
01341 
01342 static int ll_rw_extents_stats_pp_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
01343 {
01344         struct timeval now;
01345         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = seq->private;
01346         struct ll_rw_extents_info *io_extents = &sbi->ll_rw_extents_info;
01347         int k;
01348 
01349         do_gettimeofday(&now);
01350 
01351         if (!sbi->ll_rw_stats_on) {
01352                 seq_puts(seq, "disabled\n write anything in this file to activate, then 0 or \[D/d]isabled\" to deactivate\n");
01353                 return 0;
01354         }
01355         seq_printf(seq, "snapshot_time:         %lu.%lu (secs.usecs)\n",
01356                    now.tv_sec, now.tv_usec);
01357         seq_printf(seq, "%15s %19s       | %20s\n", " ", "read", "write");
01358         seq_printf(seq, "%13s   %14s %4s %4s  | %14s %4s %4s\n",
01359                    "extents", "calls", "%", "cum%",
01360                    "calls", "%", "cum%");
01361         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_pp_extent_lock);
01362         for (k = 0; k < LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX; k++) {
01363                 if (io_extents->pp_extents[k].pid != 0) {
01364                         seq_printf(seq, "\nPID: %d\n",
01365                                    io_extents->pp_extents[k].pid);
01366                         ll_display_extents_info(io_extents, seq, k);
01367                 }
01368         }
01369         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_pp_extent_lock);
01370         return 0;
01371 }
01372 
01373 static ssize_t ll_rw_extents_stats_pp_seq_write(struct file *file,
01374                                                 const char __user *buf,
01375                                                 size_t len,
01376                                                 loff_t *off)
01377 {
01378         struct seq_file *seq = file->private_data;
01379         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = seq->private;
01380         struct ll_rw_extents_info *io_extents = &sbi->ll_rw_extents_info;
01381         int i;
01382         __s64 value = 1;
01383         int rc = 0;
01384 
01385         if (len == 0)
01386                 return -EINVAL;
01387 
01388         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buf, len, &value);
01389         if (rc < 0 && len < 16) {
01390                 char kernbuf[16];
01391 
01392                 if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buf, len))
01393                         return -EFAULT;
01394                 kernbuf[len] = 0;
01395 
01396                 if (kernbuf[len - 1] == '\n')
01397                         kernbuf[len - 1] = 0;
01398 
01399                 if (strcmp(kernbuf, "disabled") == 0 ||
01400                     strcmp(kernbuf, "Disabled") == 0)
01401                         value = 0;
01402         }
01403 
01404         if (value == 0)
01405                 sbi->ll_rw_stats_on = 0;
01406         else
01407                 sbi->ll_rw_stats_on = 1;
01408 
01409         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_pp_extent_lock);
01410         for (i = 0; i < LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX; i++) {
01411                 io_extents->pp_extents[i].pid = 0;
01412                 lprocfs_oh_clear(&io_extents->pp_extents[i].pp_r_hist);
01413                 lprocfs_oh_clear(&io_extents->pp_extents[i].pp_w_hist);
01414         }
01415         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_pp_extent_lock);
01416         return len;
01417 }
01418 
01419 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_rw_extents_stats_pp);
01420 
01421 static int ll_rw_extents_stats_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
01422 {
01423         struct timeval now;
01424         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = seq->private;
01425         struct ll_rw_extents_info *io_extents = &sbi->ll_rw_extents_info;
01426 
01427         do_gettimeofday(&now);
01428 
01429         if (!sbi->ll_rw_stats_on) {
01430                 seq_puts(seq, "disabled\n write anything in this file to activate, then 0 or \"[D/d]isabled\" to deactivate\n");
01431                 return 0;
01432         }
01433         seq_printf(seq, "snapshot_time:         %lu.%lu (secs.usecs)\n",
01434                    now.tv_sec, now.tv_usec);
01435 
01436         seq_printf(seq, "%15s %19s       | %20s\n", " ", "read", "write");
01437         seq_printf(seq, "%13s   %14s %4s %4s  | %14s %4s %4s\n",
01438                    "extents", "calls", "%", "cum%",
01439                    "calls", "%", "cum%");
01440         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_lock);
01441         ll_display_extents_info(io_extents, seq, LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX);
01442         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_lock);
01443 
01444         return 0;
01445 }
01446 
01447 static ssize_t ll_rw_extents_stats_seq_write(struct file *file,
01448                                              const char __user *buf,
01449                                              size_t len, loff_t *off)
01450 {
01451         struct seq_file *seq = file->private_data;
01452         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = seq->private;
01453         struct ll_rw_extents_info *io_extents = &sbi->ll_rw_extents_info;
01454         int i;
01455         __s64 value = 1;
01456         int rc = 0;
01457 
01458         if (len == 0)
01459                 return -EINVAL;
01460 
01461         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buf, len, &value);
01462         if (rc < 0 && len < 16) {
01463                 char kernbuf[16];
01464 
01465                 if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buf, len))
01466                         return -EFAULT;
01467                 kernbuf[len] = 0;
01468 
01469                 if (kernbuf[len - 1] == '\n')
01470                         kernbuf[len - 1] = 0;
01471 
01472                 if (strcmp(kernbuf, "disabled") == 0 ||
01473                     strcmp(kernbuf, "Disabled") == 0)
01474                         value = 0;
01475         }
01476 
01477         if (value == 0)
01478                 sbi->ll_rw_stats_on = 0;
01479         else
01480                 sbi->ll_rw_stats_on = 1;
01481 
01482         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_pp_extent_lock);
01483         for (i = 0; i <= LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX; i++) {
01484                 io_extents->pp_extents[i].pid = 0;
01485                 lprocfs_oh_clear(&io_extents->pp_extents[i].pp_r_hist);
01486                 lprocfs_oh_clear(&io_extents->pp_extents[i].pp_w_hist);
01487         }
01488         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_pp_extent_lock);
01489 
01490         return len;
01491 }
01492 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_rw_extents_stats);
01493 
01494 void ll_rw_stats_tally(struct ll_sb_info *sbi, pid_t pid,
01495                        struct ll_file_data *file, loff_t pos,
01496                        size_t count, int rw)
01497 {
01498         int i, cur = -1;
01499         struct ll_rw_process_info *process;
01500         struct ll_rw_process_info *offset;
01501         int *off_count = &sbi->ll_rw_offset_entry_count;
01502         int *process_count = &sbi->ll_offset_process_count;
01503         struct ll_rw_extents_info *io_extents = &sbi->ll_rw_extents_info;
01504 
01505         if(!sbi->ll_rw_stats_on)
01506                 return;
01507         process = sbi->ll_rw_process_info;
01508         offset = sbi->ll_rw_offset_info;
01509 
01510         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_pp_extent_lock);
01511         /* Extent statistics */
01512         for(i = 0; i < LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX; i++) {
01513                 if(io_extents->pp_extents[i].pid == pid) {
01514                         cur = i;
01515                         break;
01516                 }
01517         }
01518 
01519         if (cur == -1) {
01520                 /* new process */
01521                 sbi->ll_extent_process_count =
01522                         (sbi->ll_extent_process_count + 1) % LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX;
01523                 cur = sbi->ll_extent_process_count;
01524                 io_extents->pp_extents[cur].pid = pid;
01525                 lprocfs_oh_clear(&io_extents->pp_extents[cur].pp_r_hist);
01526                 lprocfs_oh_clear(&io_extents->pp_extents[cur].pp_w_hist);
01527         }
01528 
01529         for(i = 0; (count >= (1 << LL_HIST_START << i)) &&
01530              (i < (LL_HIST_MAX - 1)); i++);
01531         if (rw == 0) {
01532                 io_extents->pp_extents[cur].pp_r_hist.oh_buckets[i]++;
01533                 io_extents->pp_extents[LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX].pp_r_hist.oh_buckets[i]++;
01534         } else {
01535                 io_extents->pp_extents[cur].pp_w_hist.oh_buckets[i]++;
01536                 io_extents->pp_extents[LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX].pp_w_hist.oh_buckets[i]++;
01537         }
01538         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_pp_extent_lock);
01539 
01540         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_process_lock);
01541         /* Offset statistics */
01542         for (i = 0; i < LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX; i++) {
01543                 if (process[i].rw_pid == pid) {
01544                         if (process[i].rw_last_file != file) {
01545                                 process[i].rw_range_start = pos;
01546                                 process[i].rw_last_file_pos = pos + count;
01547                                 process[i].rw_smallest_extent = count;
01548                                 process[i].rw_largest_extent = count;
01549                                 process[i].rw_offset = 0;
01550                                 process[i].rw_last_file = file;
01551                                 spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_process_lock);
01552                                 return;
01553                         }
01554                         if (process[i].rw_last_file_pos != pos) {
01555                                 *off_count =
01556                                     (*off_count + 1) % LL_OFFSET_HIST_MAX;
01557                                 offset[*off_count].rw_op = process[i].rw_op;
01558                                 offset[*off_count].rw_pid = pid;
01559                                 offset[*off_count].rw_range_start =
01560                                         process[i].rw_range_start;
01561                                 offset[*off_count].rw_range_end =
01562                                         process[i].rw_last_file_pos;
01563                                 offset[*off_count].rw_smallest_extent =
01564                                         process[i].rw_smallest_extent;
01565                                 offset[*off_count].rw_largest_extent =
01566                                         process[i].rw_largest_extent;
01567                                 offset[*off_count].rw_offset =
01568                                         process[i].rw_offset;
01569                                 process[i].rw_op = rw;
01570                                 process[i].rw_range_start = pos;
01571                                 process[i].rw_smallest_extent = count;
01572                                 process[i].rw_largest_extent = count;
01573                                 process[i].rw_offset = pos -
01574                                         process[i].rw_last_file_pos;
01575                         }
01576                         if(process[i].rw_smallest_extent > count)
01577                                 process[i].rw_smallest_extent = count;
01578                         if(process[i].rw_largest_extent < count)
01579                                 process[i].rw_largest_extent = count;
01580                         process[i].rw_last_file_pos = pos + count;
01581                         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_process_lock);
01582                         return;
01583                 }
01584         }
01585         *process_count = (*process_count + 1) % LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX;
01586         process[*process_count].rw_pid = pid;
01587         process[*process_count].rw_op = rw;
01588         process[*process_count].rw_range_start = pos;
01589         process[*process_count].rw_last_file_pos = pos + count;
01590         process[*process_count].rw_smallest_extent = count;
01591         process[*process_count].rw_largest_extent = count;
01592         process[*process_count].rw_offset = 0;
01593         process[*process_count].rw_last_file = file;
01594         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_process_lock);
01595 }
01596 
01597 static int ll_rw_offset_stats_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
01598 {
01599         struct timeval now;
01600         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = seq->private;
01601         struct ll_rw_process_info *offset = sbi->ll_rw_offset_info;
01602         struct ll_rw_process_info *process = sbi->ll_rw_process_info;
01603         int i;
01604 
01605         do_gettimeofday(&now);
01606 
01607         if (!sbi->ll_rw_stats_on) {
01608                 seq_puts(seq, "disabled\n write anything in this file to activate, then 0 or \"[D/d]isabled\" to deactivate\n");
01609                 return 0;
01610         }
01611         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_process_lock);
01612 
01613         seq_printf(seq, "snapshot_time:         %lu.%lu (secs.usecs)\n",
01614                    now.tv_sec, now.tv_usec);
01615         seq_printf(seq, "%3s %10s %14s %14s %17s %17s %14s\n",
01616                    "R/W", "PID", "RANGE START", "RANGE END",
01617                    "SMALLEST EXTENT", "LARGEST EXTENT", "OFFSET");
01618 
01619         /* We stored the discontiguous offsets here; print them first */
01620         for (i = 0; i < LL_OFFSET_HIST_MAX; i++) {
01621                 if (offset[i].rw_pid != 0)
01622                         seq_printf(seq,
01623                                    "%3c %10d %14Lu %14Lu %17lu %17lu %14Lu",
01624                                    offset[i].rw_op == READ ? 'R' : 'W',
01625                                    offset[i].rw_pid,
01626                                    offset[i].rw_range_start,
01627                                    offset[i].rw_range_end,
01628                                    (unsigned long)offset[i].rw_smallest_extent,
01629                                    (unsigned long)offset[i].rw_largest_extent,
01630                                    offset[i].rw_offset);
01631         }
01632 
01633         /* Then print the current offsets for each process */
01634         for (i = 0; i < LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX; i++) {
01635                 if (process[i].rw_pid != 0)
01636                         seq_printf(seq,
01637                                    "%3c %10d %14Lu %14Lu %17lu %17lu %14Lu",
01638                                    process[i].rw_op == READ ? 'R' : 'W',
01639                                    process[i].rw_pid,
01640                                    process[i].rw_range_start,
01641                                    process[i].rw_last_file_pos,
01642                                    (unsigned long)process[i].rw_smallest_extent,
01643                                    (unsigned long)process[i].rw_largest_extent,
01644                                    process[i].rw_offset);
01645         }
01646         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_process_lock);
01647 
01648         return 0;
01649 }
01650 
01651 static ssize_t ll_rw_offset_stats_seq_write(struct file *file,
01652                                             const char __user *buf,
01653                                             size_t len, loff_t *off)
01654 {
01655         struct seq_file *seq = file->private_data;
01656         struct ll_sb_info *sbi = seq->private;
01657         struct ll_rw_process_info *process_info = sbi->ll_rw_process_info;
01658         struct ll_rw_process_info *offset_info = sbi->ll_rw_offset_info;
01659         __s64 value = 1;
01660         int rc = 0;
01661 
01662         if (len == 0)
01663                 return -EINVAL;
01664 
01665         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buf, len, &value);
01666 
01667         if (rc < 0 && len < 16) {
01668                 char kernbuf[16];
01669 
01670                 if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buf, len))
01671                         return -EFAULT;
01672                 kernbuf[len] = 0;
01673 
01674                 if (kernbuf[len - 1] == '\n')
01675                         kernbuf[len - 1] = 0;
01676 
01677                 if (strcmp(kernbuf, "disabled") == 0 ||
01678                     strcmp(kernbuf, "Disabled") == 0)
01679                         value = 0;
01680         }
01681 
01682         if (value == 0)
01683                 sbi->ll_rw_stats_on = 0;
01684         else
01685                 sbi->ll_rw_stats_on = 1;
01686 
01687         spin_lock(&sbi->ll_process_lock);
01688         sbi->ll_offset_process_count = 0;
01689         sbi->ll_rw_offset_entry_count = 0;
01690         memset(process_info, 0, sizeof(struct ll_rw_process_info) *
01691                LL_PROCESS_HIST_MAX);
01692         memset(offset_info, 0, sizeof(struct ll_rw_process_info) *
01693                LL_OFFSET_HIST_MAX);
01694         spin_unlock(&sbi->ll_process_lock);
01695 
01696         return len;
01697 }
01698 
01699 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ll_rw_offset_stats);
01700 #endif /* CONFIG_PROC_FS */
